DataElement.preferredName: Positive Malignant Neoplasm Left Prostate Specimen Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a measurement by percentage indicating amount of malignant cells contained in the left half of the prostate gland (male reproductive organ) based on a sample of tissue collected for pathologic exam.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Positive Malignant Neoplasm Left Prostate Specimen
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to confirmed presence of malignant cells on the left lateral portion of the prostate gland of the male reproductive system based on a sample of tissue collected for pathologic examination.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Involving advantage or good.:A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.  Malignant neoplasms usually metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision.  The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: Left; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.:A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.

The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A percentage value expressing presence of malignant cells in a sample of tissue or body fluid.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/24/17 tt transferred context, added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.
